amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funds from being used by the NNSA to halt the construction of the HE Synthesis, Formulation, and Production facility at Pantex.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson (TX) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson (TX) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
